summary: TAKATA RECALL I WAS DRIVING ON THE I10 FREEWAY WHEN I HIT A SMALL BUMP IN THE ROAD.  THE VEHICLES STEERING WHEEL BEGAN TO SHAKE VIOLENTLY AND I STARTED LOSING CONTROL OF THE VEHICLE.  I SLOWED THE VEHICLE DOWN TO 10 MPH AND IT STOPPED.  I STARTED GOING AGAIN AND HIT A SMALL BUMP AND THE EXACT SAME THING HAPPENED.  I BELIEVE THIS IS "DEATH WOBBLE" FROM READING ALL OF THE FORUMS
